PHRASE.LANG: kName
Black Witch's Hat with Buckle
Chapeau de sorcière pointu noir
Schwarzer Hexenhut mit Schnalle
Cappello nero da strega con fibbia
Sombrero negro con hebilla para bruja
バックル付き魔女の帽子（黒・女性用）
Black Witch's Hat with Buckle (Women)
Black Witch's Hat with Buckle (Women)
Black Witch's Hat with Buckle (Women)
Black Witch's Hat with Buckle (Women)
kDesc
No witch's wardrobe should be without this traditional black pointed hat with purple hat band and brass buckle. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
La garde-robe d'une sorcière devrait toujours contenir ce chapeau pointu traditionnel noir avec bord. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
Jede Hexe sollte einen traditionellen Spitzhut in Schwarz mit violettem Hutband und Messingschnalle besitzen. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
Un guardaroba da strega non è completo senza il tradizionale cappello a nero punta con fascia viola e fibbia in ottone. [#Legal]
No debe faltar en el armario de ninguna bruja este sombrero tradicional negro de punta con cinta morada y hebilla de latón. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
紫の紐と真ちゅうバックル付きの伝統的な黒いとんがり帽子は、魔女に必要不可欠なかぶり物。 [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
No witch's wardrobe should be without this traditional black pointed hat with purple hat band and brass buckle. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
